waiputv.watchingOn.description: Shown when watching on a channel (e.g., Watching on SYFY)

waiputv.seasonEpisode.description: Shown in large image text (e.g., SYFY - Season 5, Episode 11)

waiputv.unknownShow.description: Fallback when show title cannot be determined

waiputv.unknownChannel.description: Fallback when channel name cannot be determined
